title: Baby Carrier
description: long, heavily embroidered overall; havy, stiff top has insets of pleat embroidery with center butterfly-like section, outlined in red on metallic tape; embroidered bands in red and green outline insets and entire piece; long bototm piece has large figures in orange, green and purple embroidered on black silk with gold sequins overall; satin stitch floral embroidery on bottom corners; ties carry same motif as top; lined in blue denim
